title: The Mystery of the Mysterious Island

victim.name: Ship Captain
victim.background: Captain of crashed ship on mysterious island
victim.death_details: Found dead on island filled with mysteries
victim.case_context: Ship crashed, mysteries include unlit lighthouse, screaming sounds, and captain's murder

suspects.name: Mx. Tangerine
suspects.description: Proving that non-binary people can be murderers, too: they are a sailor, chef, and suspect

suspects.name: Baron Maroon
suspects.description: An incredibly naughty man who holds a grudge. Nobody wants to offend the baron. At least, nobody who's still alive...
suspects.motive: Aristocratic entitlement, known for holding deadly grudges

suspects.name: Astrologer Azure
suspects.description: A stargazer, full of wonder and questions about the exact time and place of your birth
suspects.motive: Mystical interests, navigation expertise for island survival

weapons.name: An Old Sword
weapons.description: This was used by the bad guys in some old war. It's all rusted

weapons.name: A Spoiled Toxic Blowfish
weapons.description: It's gone bad now, so even the non-toxic parts are poisonous

weapons.name: A Shovel
weapons.description: A multi-use tool: kill someone and bury them with the same shovel!

locations.name: The Dead Woods
locations.description: All of the trees are dead. But still, something lives in these woods

locations.name: The Cliffside Lighthouse
locations.description: They discovered why the flame wasn't lit: the keeper was long dead

locations.name: The Ruined Church
locations.description: The roof has caved in and the church has spoiled

clues.description: The weapon at the cliffside lighthouse was not rusted
clues.analysis: Eliminates rusted sword from lighthouse location

clues.description: A trusted informant handed Logico a note written in a shaky hand: A OCSPIRO SAW IN HET AEDD OOWSD
clues.decoded_message: A SCORPIO WAS IN THE DEAD WOODS
points_to: Baron Maroon (Scorpio) was in Dead Woods
clues.analysis: Anagram cipher reveals astrological location constraint

statements.speaker: Mx. Tangerine
statements.statement: Well, if you ask me, Astrologer Azure brought a shovel

statements.speaker: Baron Maroon
statements.statement: A toxic blowfish was in the ruined church
statements.analysis: Blowfish was used as murder weapon in church

statements.speaker: Astrologer Azure
statements.statement: Look at the stars! They say Mx. Tangerine brought a toxic blowfish
statements.analysis: This is the lie - Azure is the murderer. Tangerine did NOT bring blowfish

solution.motive: Survival situation, elimination of navigation competition
logic_chain: Decode cipher: 'A SCORPIO WAS IN THE DEAD WOODS' = Baron Maroon in Dead Woods
Weapon at lighthouse not rusted (eliminates old sword from lighthouse)
Test Azure as liar: Tangerine did NOT bring blowfish
Maroon's truth: Blowfish in church (murder location)
Location assignments: Azure at lighthouse (shovel not rusted âœ“), Tangerine at church, Maroon at Dead Woods
Azure used shovel at lighthouse location

special_mechanics.weapon_location_separation: Murder weapon found separate from killer's location
